陀思妥也夫斯基.pinyin: Tuo2 si1 tuo3 ye3 fu1 si1 ji1
陀思妥也夫斯基.definition: Fyodor Mikhailovich Dostoevsky (1821-1881), great Russian novelist, author of Crime and Punishment 罪與罰|罪与罚[Zui4 yu3 Fa2]; also written 陀思妥耶夫斯基[Tuo2 si1 tuo3 ye1 fu1 si1 ji1]
